predicate.note: Frames file for 'undermine' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison with weaken.

roleset.name: weaken, not quantifiable

example.name: active
example.text: The index was under pressure for most of the morning over concerns that the effects of Tuesday night's major earthquake in the San Francisco area would undermine the U.S. market.
example.arg: the effects of Tuesday night's major earthquake in the San Francisco area

example.name: passive
example.text: He argues that efforts to firm up prices will be undermined *trace* by producers' plans to expand production capacity.
example.arg: producers' plans to expand production capacity

roleset.note: "Not quantifiable" means that undermine cannot take EXT, start or end point arguments, unlike weaken.
